description: Wordplay on 'fans' links a sports context with temperature change humorously.
title: Fan Mystery
n_1: Bob and Tom leave a thrilling soccer game, noticing the rising heat in the empty stadium.
n_2: They ponder why the stadium feels warmer now that it's empty.
c1_2: Was it this warm during the game?
c2_2: Not at all, it was cooler!
n_3: They discuss the possible reasons for the temperature change, feeling the heat intensify.
c1_3: Could it be the crowd's absence?
n_4: Finally, they realize it's because all of the 'fans' have left, laughing at the pun.
